name: part_001
file: tmp_【#湊あくあ3周年記念 】あくあ色 3rd Anniversary Live【湊あくあ⧸ホロライブ】 [CtOkB0YQljY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Minato Aqua performing her original song 'Aqua Iro Palette'.
Short MC section where Aqua addresses the audience.
Transition interlude with a dark screen.

subtitles.original: 道も
subtitles.english: Even the path,

subtitles.original: 君と
subtitles.english: with you,

subtitles.original: 歩けますように
subtitles.english: I hope to walk.

subtitles.original: ねぇ もっと好きになってもらいたいな
subtitles.english: Hey, I want you to like me even more

subtitles.original: 頭の中は君ばっかっていうか
subtitles.english: My head is full of nothing but you

subtitles.original: そっぽなんて向いてないで
subtitles.english: Don't look the other way

subtitles.original: あぁもうヤキモチしちゃうわ あぁ
subtitles.english: Ah, I'm getting jealous, ah

subtitles.original: ずっとずっと好きがいいの
subtitles.english: I want to love you forever and ever

subtitles.original: 心の奥まで閉じちゃうくらいに
subtitles.english: Enough to lock up the depths of my heart

subtitles.original: こっち向いてってよねぇ ダーリン
subtitles.english: Look this way, hey darling

subtitles.original: あぁもう離さないから 絶対に
subtitles.english: Ah, I'll never let go, never

subtitles.original: 君がいるから私いつでも
subtitles.english: Because you're here, I can always

subtitles.original: 頑張れるんだ
subtitles.english: keep doing my best

subtitles.original: 落ち込んで悲しくたって
subtitles.english: Even when I'm feeling down or sad

subtitles.original: 君がいるから
subtitles.english: because you're here

subtitles.original: 今日は3周年3Dライブに来てくれてありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you for coming to my 3rd anniversary 3D live today!

subtitles.original: あくあ色に染まれー！
subtitles.english: Be dyed in Aqua's colors!

subtitles.original: 君がいるから歩いてこれた
subtitles.english: I was able to walk this far because you're here

subtitles.original: 君がいなくちゃ前も見れない
subtitles.english: Without you, I can't even look ahead

subtitles.original: 嫌なこととか辛いこととかあったって
subtitles.english: Even when bad things or hard things happen

subtitles.original: 君の力でここまで笑ってこれたんだ
subtitles.english: I've been able to laugh this much thanks to your strength

subtitles.original: 今度はもっと私がぐっと引っ張って
subtitles.english: Next time, I'll pull you along even more

subtitles.original: 連れて行くんだ
subtitles.english: and take you with me

subtitles.original: 君がいるから私がいるの
subtitles.english: I exist because you're here

subtitles.original: こんな私を愛してくれるの？
subtitles.english: Will you love someone like me?

subtitles.original: ねぇ もっと まだもっと 受け止めてよねぇ
subtitles.english: Hey, more, even more, accept me, okay?

subtitles.original: ねぇいい？ さぁ声を上げて
subtitles.english: Hey, is it okay? Come on, raise your voice

subtitles.original: ねぇ もっと 好きになってもらいたいな
subtitles.english: Hey, I want you to like me even more

subtitles.original: いつでもそう私ばっかみたいに
subtitles.english: It's always just me, like...

subtitles.original: そっぽなんて向かせないわ
subtitles.english: I won't let you look the other way

subtitles.original: ねぇほら夢中にしちゃうわ あぁ
subtitles.english: Hey look, I'll make you obsessed, ah

subtitles.original: ずっとずっと好きがいいの
subtitles.english: I want to love you forever and ever

subtitles.original: 心も体も染まっちゃうくらいに
subtitles.english: Enough to be dyed, heart and soul

subtitles.original: こっち向いてってよねぇ ダーリン
subtitles.english: Look this way, hey darling

subtitles.original: あぁもう離さないから 絶対に
subtitles.english: Ah, I'll never let go, never

subtitles.original: 絶対ね
subtitles.english: Promise me

subtitles.original: 絶対よ
subtitles.english: I mean it

subtitles.original: 約束だよ
subtitles.english: It's a promise

subtitles.original: 愛しちゃうもっと
subtitles.english: I'll love you even more

subtitles.original:
おねがいダーリン
作詞/作曲：ナナホシ管弦楽団
subtitles.english:
Please Darling
Lyrics/Composition: Nanahoshi Orchestra

subtitles.original: おねがいダーリン見て聞いて欲しいの
subtitles.english: Please Darling, I want you to look and listen

subtitles.original: ダーリン あなた私のこと全然聞かない
subtitles.english: Darling, you don't listen to me at all

subtitles.original: あれほどやめてって言ったタバコもお酒も
subtitles.english: Neither the cigarettes nor the alcohol I told you to stop

subtitles.original: 毎日さかんな遊びも一日たりとも欠かさず
subtitles.english: Playing around so much every day, without missing a single day

subtitles.original: 肝臓労わって欲しいなんてお願いしても
subtitles.english: Even if I ask you to take care of your liver

subtitles.original: 完了してあげないんだから
subtitles.english: I'm not going to finish it for you

subtitles.original: ああ言えばこう言うこと聞かない あなたのハートは真っ黒です
subtitles.english: You always have a comeback and don't listen, your heart is pitch black

subtitles.original: 言いたいことは言わないし
subtitles.english: You don't say what you want to say

subtitles.original: 行きたいところへも連れて行ってくれない
subtitles.english: And you don't take me where I want to go

subtitles.original: ねぇ そんなのバカみたいじゃない
subtitles.english: Hey, isn't that just stupid?

subtitles.original: そうじゃない じゃない じゃない
subtitles.english: That's not it, not it, not it

subtitles.original: いつも思わせぶりな感じで
subtitles.english: Always with that suggestive vibe

subtitles.original: 察して欲しい感じで
subtitles.english: With that 'I want you to figure it out' vibe

subtitles.original: わざと口にしないの ずるくない？
subtitles.english: Purposely not saying it, isn't that unfair?

subtitles.original: バカじゃないの？
subtitles.english: Are you an idiot?

subtitles.original: おねがいダーリン見て聞いて欲しいのは
subtitles.english: Please Darling, what I want you to look and listen to is

subtitles.original: 形のないもの
subtitles.english: something without form

subtitles.original: 馬鹿にしないで見て聞いて覗いてよ
subtitles.english: Don't make fun of me, look, listen, and peek in

subtitles.original: 瞳の奥の方
subtitles.english: at the depths of my eyes

subtitles.original: まっすぐ見つめて
subtitles.english: Stare straight at me

subtitles.original: おねがいダーリンしてみて欲しいの
subtitles.english: Please Darling, I want you to try it

subtitles.original: ダーリン 私はあなたの気持ちを全然知らないわ
subtitles.english: Darling, I don't know your feelings at all

subtitles.original: あれほど健気に見つめてきたのに
subtitles.english: Even though I've been looking at you so admirably

subtitles.original: 今ではすっかり知らんぷり
subtitles.english: Now you're completely ignoring me

subtitles.original: って言うかそれって胡座かいてるだけなんじゃないですか？ぶっちゃけ
subtitles.english: I mean, isn't that just you being complacent? To be blunt

subtitles.original: 四六時中あなたのせいで私のハートはボロボロです
subtitles.english: My heart is in tatters 24/7 because of you

subtitles.original: つれない時はつれないし
subtitles.english: When you're cold, you're cold

subtitles.original: 意地悪ばかり言うから いつも私は風邪気味
subtitles.english: Because you only say mean things, I'm always feeling a bit under the weather

subtitles.original: ねぇ 何だかバカみたいじゃない
subtitles.english: Hey, isn't that just kind of stupid?

subtitles.original: そうじゃない じゃない じゃない
subtitles.english: That's not it, not it, not it

subtitles.original: どこか足元見てる感じで
subtitles.english: Like you're looking down on me somehow

subtitles.original: 値踏みされてる感じで
subtitles.english: Like you're appraising me
